verses.verse: And <S%G2532><s%> He Entered <S%G1525><s%> Again <S%G3825><s%> Into <S%G1519><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Synagogue, <S%G4864><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> There Was <S%G2258><s%> There <S%G1563><s%> A Man <S%G444><s%> Withered <S%G3583><s%> Having His <S%G2192><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Hand, <S%G5495><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> They Were Watching <S%G3906><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> Whether <S%G1487><s%> On The <S%G3588><s%> Sabbath <S%G4521><s%> He Will Heal <S%G2323><s%> Him, <S%G846><s%> In Order That <S%G2443><s%> They Might Accuse <S%G2723><s%> Him. <S%G846><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> He Says <S%G3004><s%> To The <S%G3588><s%> Man <S%G444><s%> Who <S%G3588><s%> Withered <S%G3583><s%> Had <S%G2192><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Hand, <S%G5495><s%> Arise And Come <S%G1453><s%> Into <S%G1519><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Midst. <S%G3319><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> He Says <S%G3004><s%> To Them, <S%G846><s%> Is It Lawful <S%G1832><s%> On The <S%G3588><s%> Sabbaths <S%G4521><s%> , To Do Good, <S%G15><s%> Or <S%G2228><s%> To Do Evil? <S%G2554><s%> Life <S%G5590><s%> To Save, <S%G4982><s%> Or <S%G2228><s%> To Kill? <S%G615><s%> <S%G3588><s%> But They <S%G1161><s%> Were Silent. <S%G4623><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Having Looked Around On <S%G4017><s%> Them <S%G846><s%> ' With <S%G3326><s%> Anger, <S%G3709><s%> Being Grieved <S%G4818><s%> At <S%G1909><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Hardness <S%G4457><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G2588><s%> Of Their Heart, <S%G846><s%> He Says <S%G3004><s%> To The <S%G3588><s%> Man, <S%G444><s%> Stretch Out <S%G1614><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G5495><s%> Thy Hand. <S%G4675><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> He Stretched Out It, <S%G1614><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Was Restored <S%G600><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G5495><s%> His Hand <S%G846><s%> Sound <S%G5199><s%> As <S%G5613><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Other. <S%G243><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Having Gone Out <S%G1831><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Pharisees <S%G5330><s%> Immediately <S%G2112><s%> With <S%G3326><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Herodians <S%G2265><s%> Counsel <S%G4824><s%> Took <S%G4160><s%> ' Against <S%G2596><s%> Him, <S%G846><s%> How <S%G3704><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> They Might Destroy. <S%G622><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Withdrew <S%G402><s%> With <S%G3326><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3101><s%> His Disciples <S%G846><s%> To <S%G4314><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Sea; <S%G2281><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Great <S%G4183><s%> A Multitude <S%G4128><s%> From <S%G575><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Galilee <S%G1056><s%> Followed <S%G190><s%> , Him, <S%G846><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> From <S%G575><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Judea, <S%G2449><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> From <S%G575><s%> Jerusalem, <S%G2414><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> From <S%G575><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Idumaea, <S%G2401><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Beyond <S%G4008><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Jordan; <S%G2446><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> They <S%G3588><s%> Around <S%G4012><s%> Tyre <S%G5184><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Sidon, <S%G4605><s%> A Multitude <S%G4128><s%> Great, <S%G4183><s%> Having Heard <S%G191><s%> How Much <S%G3745><s%> He Was Doing <S%G4160><s%> Came <S%G2064><s%> To <S%G4314><s%> Him. <S%G846><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> He Spoke <S%G2036><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3101><s%> To His Disciples, <S%G846><s%> That <S%G2443><s%> A Small Ship <S%G4142><s%> Might Wait Upon <S%G4342><s%> Him, <S%G846><s%> On Account Of <S%G1223><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Crowd, <S%G3793><s%> <S%G2443><s%> That <S%G3361><s%> They Might Not Press Upon <S%G2346><s%> Him. <S%G846><s%>

<S%G4183><s%> For Many <S%G1063><s%> He Healed, <S%G2323><s%> So That <S%G5620><s%> They Beset <S%G1968><s%> Him, <S%G846><s%> That <S%G2443><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> They Might Touch, <S%G680><s%> As Many As <S%G3745><s%> Had <S%G2192><s%> Scourges; <S%G3148><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Spirits <S%G4151><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Unclean, <S%G169><s%> When <S%G3752><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> , They Beheld, <S%G2334><s%> Fell Down Before <S%G4363><s%> Him, <S%G846><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Cried, <S%G2896><s%> , <S%G3004><s%> Saying, <S%G3754><s%> Thou <S%G4771><s%> Art <S%G1488><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Son <S%G5207><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of God. <S%G2316><s%>
And <S%G2532><s%> Much <S%G4183><s%> He Rebuked <S%G2008><s%> Them, <S%G846><s%> So That <S%G2443><s%> Not <S%G3361><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> Manifest <S%G5318><s%> They Should Make. <S%G4160><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> He Goes Up <S%G305><s%> Into <S%G1519><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Mountain, <S%G3735><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Calls To Him <S%G4341><s%> Whom <S%G3739><s%> Would <S%G2309><s%> He; <S%G846><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> They Went <S%G565><s%> To <S%G4314><s%> Him. <S%G846><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> He Appointed <S%G4160><s%> Twelve <S%G1427><s%> That <S%G2443><s%> They Might Be <S%G5600><s%> ' With <S%G3326><s%> Him, <S%G846><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> That <S%G2443><s%> He Might Send <S%G649><s%> Them <S%G846><s%> To Preach, <S%G2784><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> To Have <S%G2192><s%> Authority <S%G1849><s%> To Heal <S%G2323><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Diseases <S%G3554><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> To Cast Out <S%G1544><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Demons. <S%G1140><s%>
And <S%G2532><s%> He Added <S%G2007><s%> <S%G3588><s%> To Simon The <S%G4613><s%> Name <S%G3686><s%> Peter; <S%G4074><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> James <S%G2385><s%> The Son <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of Zebedee, <S%G2199><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> John <S%G2491><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Brother <S%G80><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of James; <S%G2385><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> He Added <S%G2007><s%> To Them The <S%G846><s%> Names <S%G3686><s%> Boanerges, <S%G993><s%> Which <S%G3739><s%> Is <S%G2076><s%> Sons <S%G5207><s%> Of Thunder; <S%G1027><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Andrew, <S%G406><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Philip, <S%G5376><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Bartholomew, <S%G918><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> , Matthew, <S%G3156><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Thomas, <S%G2381><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> James <S%G2385><s%> The Son <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of Alphaeus, <S%G256><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Thaddaeus, <S%G2280><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Simon <S%G4613><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> , Canaanite, <S%G2581><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Judas <S%G2455><s%> , Iscariot, <S%G2469><s%> Who <S%G3739><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> Delivered Up <S%G3860><s%> Him. <S%G846><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> They Come <S%G2064><s%> To <S%G1519><s%> A House : <S%G3624><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Comes Together <S%G4905><s%> Again <S%G3825><s%> A Crowd, <S%G3793><s%> <S%G5620><s%> So That <S%G3361><s%> <S%G1410><s%> <S%G846><s%> They Are Not Able So Much As <S%G3383><s%> Bread <S%G740><s%> To Eat. <S%G5315><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Having Heard Of It <S%G191><s%> Those <S%G3588><s%> ' Belonging To <S%G3844><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> Went Out <S%G1831><s%> To Lay Hold Of <S%G2902><s%> Him; <S%G846><s%> <S%G3004><s%> <S%G1063><s%> For They Said, <S%G3754><s%> He Is Beside Himself. <S%G1839><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Scribes <S%G1122><s%> Who <S%G3588><s%> From <S%G575><s%> Jerusalem <S%G2414><s%> Came Down <S%G2597><s%> <S%G3004><s%> Said, <S%G3754><s%> Beelzebub <S%G954><s%> He Has; <S%G2192><s%> <S%G2532><s%> And <S%G3754><s%> By <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Prince <S%G758><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Demons <S%G1140><s%> He Casts Out <S%G1544><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Demons. <S%G1140><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Having Called To Him <S%G4341><s%> Them <S%G846><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Parables <S%G3850><s%> He Said <S%G3004><s%> To Them, <S%G846><s%> How <S%G4459><s%> Can <S%G1410><s%> Satan <S%G4567><s%> Satan <S%G4567><s%> Cast Out? <S%G1544><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> If <S%G1437><s%> A Kingdom <S%G932><s%> ' Against <S%G1909><s%> Itself <S%G1438><s%> Be Divided, <S%G3307><s%> <S%G3756><s%> Is Not Able <S%G1410><s%> To Stand <S%G2476><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G932><s%> That Kingdom : <S%G1565><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> If <S%G1437><s%> A House <S%G3614><s%> ' Against <S%G1909><s%> Itself <S%G1438><s%> Be Divided, <S%G3307><s%> Not <S%G3756><s%> Is Able <S%G1410><s%> To Stand <S%G2476><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3614><s%> That House : <S%G1565><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> If <S%G1487><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Satan <S%G4567><s%> Has Risen Up <S%G450><s%> ' Against <S%G1909><s%> Himself <S%G1438><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> , Has Been Divided, <S%G3307><s%> <S%G3756><s%> He Is Not Able <S%G1410><s%> , To Stand, <S%G2476><s%> But <S%G235><s%> An End <S%G5056><s%> Has. <S%G2192><s%>

<S%G3756><s%> <S%G1410><s%> No One In Any Wise Is Able <S%G3762><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Goods <S%G4632><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Strong Man, <S%G2478><s%> Having Entered <S%G1525><s%> Into <S%G1519><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3614><s%> His House, <S%G846><s%> To Plunder, <S%G1283><s%> <S%G1437><s%> Unless <S%G3361><s%> First <S%G4412><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Strong Man <S%G2478><s%> He Bind, <S%G1210><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Then <S%G5119><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3614><s%> His House <S%G846><s%> He Will Plunder. <S%G1283><s%>

Verily <S%G281><s%> I Say <S%G3004><s%> To You, <S%G5213><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> All <S%G3956><s%> Shall Be Forgiven <S%G863><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Sins <S%G265><s%> To The <S%G3588><s%> Sons <S%G5207><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of Men, <S%G444><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Blasphemies <S%G988><s%> <S%G3745><s%> Whatsoever <S%G302><s%> They Shall Have Blasphemed; <S%G987><s%>

<S%G3739><s%> ' <S%G1161><s%> But Whosoever <S%G302><s%> Shall Blaspheme <S%G987><s%> Against <S%G1519><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Spirit <S%G4151><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Holy, <S%G40><s%> <S%G3756><s%> Has Not <S%G2192><s%> Forgiveness <S%G859><s%> To <S%G1519><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Eternity, <S%G165><s%> ' But <S%G235><s%> Liable To <S%G1777><s%> Is <S%G2076><s%> Eternal <S%G166><s%> , Judgment; <S%G2920><s%>
Because <S%G3754><s%> They Said, <S%G3004><s%> <S%G4151><s%> An Unclean Spirit <S%G169><s%> He Has. <S%G2192><s%>

<S%G2064><s%> Then Come His <S%G3767><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Brethren <S%G80><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3384><s%> His Mother, <S%G846><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Without <S%G1854><s%> Standing <S%G2476><s%> Sent <S%G649><s%> To <S%G4314><s%> Him, <S%G846><s%> Calling <S%G5455><s%> Him. <S%G846><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Sat <S%G2521><s%> A Crowd <S%G3793><s%> Around <S%G4012><s%> Him : <S%G846><s%> <S%G2036><s%> And They Said <S%G1161><s%> To Him, <S%G846><s%> , Behold, <S%G2400><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3384><s%> Thy Mother <S%G4675><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G80><s%> Thy Brethren <S%G4675><s%> Without <S%G1854><s%> Seek <S%G2212><s%> Thee. <S%G4571><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> He Answered <S%G611><s%> Them, <S%G846><s%> , Saying, <S%G3004><s%> Who <S%G5101><s%> Is <S%G2076><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3384><s%> My Mother <S%G3450><s%> Or <S%G2228><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Brethren <S%G80><s%> My? <S%G3450><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Having Looked Around On <S%G4017><s%> In A Circuit <S%G2945><s%> Those Who <S%G3588><s%> Around <S%G4012><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> Were Sitting, <S%G2521><s%> He Says, <S%G3004><s%> Behold, <S%G1492><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3384><s%> My Mother <S%G3450><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Brethren <S%G80><s%> My : <S%G3450><s%>

<S%G3739><s%> <S%G1063><s%> For Whoever <S%G302><s%> Shall Do <S%G4160><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Will <S%G2307><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of God, <S%G2316><s%> He <S%G3778><s%> Brother <S%G80><s%> My <S%G3450><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G79><s%> My Sister <S%G3450><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Mother <S%G3384><s%> Is. <S%G2076><s%>
